div.head: Introduction to Chechen Specifications
div.p: These specifications for Chechen are inspired by the specifications for morphosyntactic specifications for Slovene and Russian. The specifications were developped by Dietmar Fiesel for his MA thesis in computational linguistics at the Eberhard Karls Universitaet Tuebingen, Germany. Some features were subsequnetly modified by Toma≈æ Erjavec, to make the specifications better compatible with the other MULTEXT-East languages.

div.head: Chechen Attribute Index
div.p: In this section all the attributes presented in the tables are listed in alphabetical order.

div.head: Chechen Value Index
div.p: The values presented within the tables are, in the following, listed in alphabetical order; the first column gives the name of the value, the second column its code and the third lists attributes for which the value is appropriate.
